summary: This is a Bear Stearns monthly account statement for Jeffrey Epstein for August 2006, showing a portfolio valued at over $17 million. It details holdings in cash equivalents and equities, and records significant wire transfers to and from JPMorgan Chase Bank.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The primary account holder for the Bear Stearns investment portfolio detailed in this statement.

persons.name: Jeanne Brenan
persons.context: Listed as the attention contact at the Financial Trust Company for mailing the statement to Epstein in St. Thomas, VI.

connections.description: Brenan is listed as the contact at the Financial Trust Company servicing Epstein's account, indicating a professional financial services relationship.

events.title: August 2006 Account Activity
events.description: Monthly financial activity for Jeffrey Epstein's Bear Stearns account, including deposits, withdrawals, dividends, and portfolio management.

events.title: Wire Transfer to JPMorgan Chase
events.description: A $1,000,000 wire transfer from the Bear Stearns account to JPMorgan Chase Bank.

events.title: Wire Transfer to JPMorgan Chase
events.description: A $2,000,000 wire transfer from the Bear Stearns account to JPMorgan Chase Bank.

events.title: Large Deposit from Compass Bank
events.description: A deposit of $12,749,804.62 into the Bear Stearns account, wired from Compass Bank via Citibank.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein's Bear Stearns investment portfolio had a total market value of $17,035,517 as of August 31, 2006.
The account showed significant liquidity, with over $12.4 million held in the Dreyfus Cash Management Fund.
Multiple large wire transfers totaling $4 million were sent to a JPMorgan Chase Bank account (AC739110038) during August 2006.
A single, massive deposit of $12,749,804.62 was made to the account on August 14, 2006, originating from Compass Bank.
The document is marked 'Confidential Treatment Requested by JPMorgan Chase', indicating its relevance to subsequent legal proceedings involving the bank.
